context: By 2020, AppLovin had established itself as a significant player in mobile advertising and app monetization, holding an 8.71% market share in the mobile ad network category. The company competed with 37 other tools in the mobile ad network space. AppLovin's focus on gaming-specific advertising solutions and its developing AI-driven optimization technology positioned it competitively against larger tech giants and specialized mobile ad platforms. The company's AppDiscovery and MAX platforms were gaining traction among mobile developers seeking effective user acquisition and monetization solutions.
